title: "Height of a room" means the vertical distance measured, from the finished floor surface to the finished ceiling/soffit of slab
clause_text: "Height of a room" means the vertical distance measured, from the finished floor surface to the finished ceiling/soffit of slab. The height of a room with a pitched roof means the average height between the finished floor surface and the bottom of the eaves and the bottom of the ridge.
